text:
calling the int read() function on ServletInputStream does not result in "an 
int in the range 0 to 255" as specified by SUN for all input streams. It, 
instead, returns a signed int in the range of -128 to 127. This breaks the rule 
of checking for a -1 to determine end of stream.
creator: rory.carr@returnpath.net
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
This problem has already been fixed in Tomcat 3.2.3-dev.  Please try the latest 
nightly tomcat_32 build to verify.
